Sentencas: Green hydrogen is anticipated to play a major role in a Net-Zero 2050 scenario since it can be produced using sustainable renewable energy sources, resulting in no greenhouse gas emissions.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, hydrogen has a high energy density and is readily stored and transferred, making it a versatile and convenient fuel for a broad range of applications.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: In this regard, an attempt has been made to study a solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: The article presents a detailed thermoeconomic analysis along with genetic algorithm-based optimization studies of the system.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: The optimum values of energetic efficiency and the cost of hydrogen are found to be 25.15 % and 1.021 $/kg, respectively.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Exergy analysis reveals that the highest exergy destruction occurs in solar photovoltaic thermal (67.83 %) and parabolic trough solar collector (13.31 %), respectively.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, performance results of the solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system are compared with other hydrogen production technologies.
Titulo: A solar-assisted power-to-hydrogen system based on proton-conducting solid oxide electrolyzer cells
